name: Grimstone
description:
Grimstone is an eldritch themed roguelike with tense turn-based combat on a hex-grid. Players explore levels of a corrupted mine to find the source of the mine’s madness and destroy it. As you explore, discover customizable abilities and bring back resources to upgrade their town and characters, restoring the town to its former glory.

This game was a student project.
